website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for anyone who understands the berry growing process, but it can be tedious and time consuming.
pros: Provides the essentials needed for germination
Includes biodegradable pots, labels, starter pellets, and seeds
4 types of berry seeds: blueberry, goji, blackberry, and raspberry
cons: Some seeds must be stratified in cold conditions for up to 90 days for germination to take place
Some plants take a few years to thrive

customer_reviews.title: I feel like the way the kit was described made it seem ...
customer_reviews.text: The kit is very cute and well put together, but it implies that it will be easier to plant and grow the seeds than I expected. Once you read the instructions in the box, you have to refrigerate some for 90 days, some will take two years and a transplant before they grow the berries, etc. I feel like the way the kit was described made it seem like a fun thing to grow in a window. It's not actually that.
customer_reviews.author: Rae B

customer_reviews.title: Didn't follow the instructions, but its still grew....
customer_reviews.text: I have ADHD so of course I couldn't wait the 90 day germination period. I used germination trays with the soil from the package and planted the seeds. I fully expected to most likely not get any results since I didn't follow the instructions. However, 2 weeks later the seeds are sprouting. I don't recommend not following the instructions, but go ahead and ignore them if you live dangerously like me (just kidding).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom for Christmas because she loves to garden and really wants to create a fabulous garden this next summer. FABULOUS gift idea - she was sooooo excited to receive such an cool, all include kit to jump-start her garden this spring. ********JUST KNOW THAT SEEDS NEED TO BE REFRIGERATED FOR 90 DAYS BEFORE PLANTING*****. I would be sad if someone got ready to plant these seeds and then learned they have to wait for three more months to use them - then the season would be over.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No growth
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about receiving these seeds. I received them in a timely manner so no complaints there. My complaint is, othing happened, I followed the directions but there was no growth whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya M. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Low germination on seeds that were stored in the cold.
customer_reviews.text: As per the directions, the raspberries, blueberries, and blackberries need to be stored in the fridge or freezer. I took them out after a few months of waiting only to have just two blueberries germinate, the rest are no show after 45 days in the soil. The pots they come with tend to dry out easily and get moldy if you water them too much. Since you will be waiting for them to germinate you will run into one or the other.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nothing grew except goji berry used aerogarden Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Jon d

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: This growing kit is perfect. I LOVE IT. Everything is designed very nicely and it makes it the perfect gift. All that you need is in the kit and the instructions are very clear even for a beginner like me.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin R Heald

customer_reviews.title: Can’t plant for 3 months!  What?
customer_reviews.text: For a beginner gardener, I didn’t understand that I would have to refrigerate or freeze for 90 days. I just thought all seeds go in the dirt to grow. There is nothing that I clearly noticed that said you have to wait 3 months to plant. If it did, I wouldn’t have gotten them. I can’t plant until mid June! Won’t that be too hot for them?
customer_reviews.author: Debra Slone

customer_reviews.title: 2 to 3 month germination
customer_reviews.text: The kit seems to be ok just theirs a catch on germination 2 to 3 months the seeds directions indicate" they" the seeds must be put in the refrigerator for 2 months and the blueberries in the freezer for 90 days and your suppose to top the plants the first year so you won't get any fruit. I've read that certain blueberries can only be grown in certain region's so I don't have a lot of faith in this kit if they were honest they would of told you about the germination process. Anyway go to your local Lowe's and pick up a blueberry bush. I wished I had. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: All Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Total bust for us.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately nothing grew although we followed directions to the letter.
customer_reviews.author: john and linda curtis

customer_reviews.title: Growing soil is terrible, will not hold moister longer then a few ...
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 of the seeds sprouted, then quickly died after 1 inch. Growing soil is terrible, will not hold moister longer then a few days, pots get moldy along the outside. Dont buy!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cool

customer_reviews.title: everything I need in one box
customer_reviews.text: It is scary starting from seeds....but the company has my back. They said they would help me if things don't go as planned. The kit had pots, soil and seeds and markers. All I need in one box....Nothing is growing yet, but I am excited.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Won't grow
customer_reviews.text: This product is no good. Started a garden with a variety of fruits and veggies and had no problem learning and growing from seeds. Had this product for several weeks and still not the tiniest sprout. Followed directions precisely and nothing. Seeds must not be good.
customer_reviews.author: jesus flores

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Quite complicated to get them to sprout. Ended up going with purchased seedlings.
customer_reviews.author: miriam c.

customer_reviews.title: ... one out of four started growing and it’s not easy waste of
customer_reviews.text: There’s directions inside the box at tell you how to do it but also in a little pamphlet it tells you that you need to put it in the refrigerator for 30 days I did not see that there for only one out of four started growing and it’s not easy waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Deborah hornstein

customer_reviews.title: Product came as it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson for Christmas, don't know if he's used it or not. We're hoping for good results. It came as described. If it works will buy other products. Can't really rate it as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: ADSW

customer_reviews.title: Luck of the Draw
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and use. But nothing came about after you plant seeds & follow instructions. Nothing has sprouted or grown. Waste of money and disappointing
customer_reviews.author: sosmary

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really not what I expected and not what I would have ordered and given as a gift. I also didn't read the product description well at all to realize that these are seeds and not two or three year old plants. I do a lot of gardening and I thought that this was a great idea to give to the kids nieces and nephews to teach them some gardening and have fruit forming. Not realizing that it was seeds and will take years to mature. I spent $40 on eight seed packs. Geez
customer_reviews.author: chuck the woodchuck

customer_reviews.title: This is a huge waste of money
customer_reviews.text: First the seeds are not ready for 90 days. Then they do not grow. I tried three times. This is a huge waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Kosten

customer_reviews.title: Complete and easy
customer_reviews.text: The kit arrived complete and all of the instructions were easy to follow. I purchased this kit in the winter and intend to start them in the early spring after the germination period. This kit is a great way to easily get the berries started indoors and move them outside when they get a little larger. The kit also came with the assurance the seeds would sprout, or else they would send more. This is a great product for anyone wanted to get into berry growing.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nothing grew at all.
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions and nothing grew.... What a disappointment. Would like to try again... People are getting good outcomes except me. Comes with an adorable set of everything you need to grow stuff I just couldn't get anything to grow for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy D

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment !
customer_reviews.text: Never told u it had to be in refrigerator for3 months and then planted. Mine never bloomed. Got in May. Don't waste your money!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Messy Mary

customer_reviews.title: WASTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: After much waiting, no growth. Don't waste your time or your money. I think a refund is in order... This was rubbish...
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very cool kit! I bought it so me and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool kit! I bought it so me and my daughter could plant together and I’m happy I did ! It’s very user friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I thought the product was okay. My plants have yet to grow, but I’m sure that’s more my fault. It is the seeds so it does take a lot of work like a few of them require refrigeration before planting them.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Easter for my 10yo, should really say ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Easter for my 10yo, should really say that 3/4 seeds need to be germinated for 90 days before they can be planted.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ford

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The pots given with the kit molded right after planting and none of the planted seeds sprouted even when sowed in more adequate planters.. Then after I initiated contact with seller which the only way found was via a return.. They won't refund until I ship the failed dirt.. HASSLE not needed for a busy gardener
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Engilis

customer_reviews.title: Nature's Blossom Fruit Growing Kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, folks really put alot of effort into this, and it certainly shows, thank you so much for providing this as a kit
customer_reviews.author: NormaRae

customer_reviews.title: Better purchase this 3 months before you plan to germinate ...
customer_reviews.text: Better purchase this 3 months before you plan to germinate the seeds as they need to go in the freezer for at least that long before planting.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann OKane

customer_reviews.title: Really cool
customer_reviews.text: I like this. A bit of a botonist so I enjoy growing these
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: One out of 4 is bad
customer_reviews.text: The compacted soil and biodegradable pots were well designed. Setup was easy. After 2 weeks only one of the pots actually grew despite following the directions perfectly. I suspect the seeds may have been old.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Tate

customer_reviews.title: Followed Directions but No Growrh
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed...should have read the reviews. NO GROWTH! There is a reason that this product is not at least four stars!
customer_reviews.author: J Hill

customer_reviews.title: it didnt grow
customer_reviews.text: the seeds didn't work, more than two months it didn't grow, this is the third time I buy it, they never grow
customer_reviews.author: Amal Alsharif

customer_reviews.title: no seeds!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited for the berry seed kit! However, I had to return it to amazon because it did not include the seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a second kit from Nature’s Blossom for my siblings as a gift! Can’t wait for them have fun planting. All materials are provided, the detailed step by step instructions make the process very easy and entertaining. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Mango

customer_reviews.title: Growing Plants Made Easy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mother who is an avid gardener. She planted these in her FL home with a day of receiving them. The plants quickly bore fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: NO BERRIES FOR YEARS
customer_reviews.text: Great set up. But WTF. They don’t produce berries for YEARS. A giant let down for the kids and I. Also the first step in the directions is to put the seeds in your fridge for 90 days. Um. That’s not how a kit should work.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Shannon Cox

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! Waist of money! Only 1 of the 4 plants grew!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the awesome customer service team who answered all my questions!! My berry seeds have started to sprout and I can’t wait to see what will come of in a few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Markos L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grow kit!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this berry grow kit for my office and it is coming in great! The seeds have sprouted and Im hoping for berrys soon! Makes for a great gift also. Thanks to the customer service team who helped assure me the best practices to make the grow kit work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: non of seeds grew. all dead seeds.
customer_reviews.text: I trusted review, Non of the seeds grew. Do not buy it. Wasted money. Just buy berries ready to eat at grocery shop.
customer_reviews.author: Eunil

customer_reviews.title: No seeds yet
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instruction to a T, it says it takes 4-6 weeks for the seedlings to sprout but nothings grown yet. However I am only on week 4, so perhaps something will grow in the next 2 weeks. I'll try to keep updating everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The garden is waiting for these its fun, and delicious
customer_reviews.text: My wife couldn't wait to get her hands on this berry kit. The garden is waiting for these its fun, and delicious!!! Super easy to work with ! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Haybelam@13

customer_reviews.title: Give a gift of seeds. They can watch them grow!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to gifts of seeds for Easter! They were all delighted!
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: no grouth
customer_reviews.text: only one of the seeds sprouted did everything by dretion

customer_reviews.title: Scratch
customer_reviews.text: The gogi berry took off and is doing okay about 3" tall. Rest are still in freezer but will plant soon.
customer_reviews.author: Scratch

customer_reviews.title: Nothing sprouted
customer_reviews.text: Not one seed blossomed into a berry. My 8yr old daughter watched every day in disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Kim Stamps

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing t grow at all
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me at all ..I followed directions step by step but nothing upsetting

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love how convenient everything came packaged. They were so easy to set up and plant! They were perfect for my kitchen bay window.

customer_reviews.title: We love berries and very excited to grow our own
customer_reviews.text: We love berries and very excited to grow our own! This kit is the perfect holiday gift for our kids! Very easy to follow directions.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Gillien

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: Seeds sprouted up wonderfully... We are planting the last two this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: BatGuy19

customer_reviews.title: It’s different from all the other planting kits you buy at the store.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a birthday present for my little cousin she loves gardening.

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: Not one single seed germinated nothing rip off f*** you

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea, but I'm in Central Florida and do not believe these berries will do well. I purchased another one as gift for family in Up State NY. I think they will get better use out of it. I may send mine to them as well.. they can have a bunch of berries going :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R Shawe

customer_reviews.title: Thanks a lot, love it!
customer_reviews.text: My second set, after buying the superfood kit I’m really happy, will probably get all of them eventually, great way to save money and eat fresh!
customer_reviews.author: yaniv bekerman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Came on time and the items looked great. I planted it all and now waiting to see the results. Hoping to have some berries very soon! I'll update with pics once I have some plants!
customer_reviews.author: Ady Sekely
